title: Segfault in libcore
body:
I am getting a segfault here:

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c132c96a6daa86ba6b9e587a89dca1ce5c445dd1/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs#L2847

```
#0  0x0000555555968d95 in <core::slice::Iter<T> as core::iter::traits::exact_size::ExactSizeIterator>::len (self=0x7fffff7ff030) at /rustc/33ef0bad21d6bb646c7c3ab0dbf381ca96c324bf/src/libcore/slice/mod.rs:2847
#1  <core::iter::adapters::zip::Zip<A,B> as core::iter::adapters::zip::ZipImpl<A,B>>::new (a=..., b=...) at /rustc/33ef0bad21d6bb646c7c3ab0dbf381ca96c324bf/src/libcore/iter/adapters/zip.rs:153
#2  0x0000555555969779 in core::iter::adapters::zip::Zip<A,B>::new (a=..., b=...) at /rustc/33ef0bad21d6bb646c7c3ab0dbf381ca96c324bf/src/libcore/iter/adapters/zip.rs:23
#3  0x000055555596862a in core::iter::traits::iterator::Iterator::zip (self=..., other=&[usize](len: 1) = {...}) at /rustc/33ef0bad21d6bb646c7c3ab0dbf381ca96c324bf/src/libcore/iter/traits/iterator.rs:504
#4  0x00005555557cbc06 in ndarray::dimension::stride_offset_checked_arithmetic (dim=0x7fffff7ff6a0, strides=0x7fffff7ff6b0, index=0x7fffff7ff588) at <::itertools::izip macros>:6
#5  0x00005555557cb090 in ndarray::dimension::can_index_slice (data=&[f64](len: 6) = {...}, dim=0x7fffff7ff6a0, strides=0x7fffff7ff6b0)
    at /home/joseph/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ndarray-0.11.2/src/dimension/mod.rs:92
#6  0x0000555555847883 in ndarray::impl_constructors::<impl ndarray::ArrayBase<S,D>>::from_vec_dim_stride_unchecked (dim=..., strides=..., v=Vec<f64>(len: 6, cap: 6) = {...})
    at /home/joseph/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ndarray-0.11.2/src/impl_constructors.rs:315
#7  0x000055555584728f in ndarray::impl_constructors::<impl ndarray::ArrayBase<S,D>>::from_shape_vec_unchecked (shape=..., v=Vec<f64>(len: 6, cap: 6) = {...})
    at /home/joseph/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ndarray-0.11.2/src/impl_constructors.rs:298
#8  0x0000555555846484 in ndarray::impl_methods::<impl ndarray::ArrayBase<S,D>>::to_owned (self=0x7fffff800410)
    at /home/joseph/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ndarray-0.11.2/src/impl_methods.rs:133
#9  0x000055555584a7fe in ndarray::impl_ops::arithmetic_ops::<impl core::ops::arith::Sub<&ndarray::ArrayBase<S2,E>> for &ndarray::ArrayBase<S,D>>::sub (self=0x7fffff800410, rhs=0x7fffff800388)
    at /home/joseph/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ndarray-0.11.2/src/impl_ops.rs:118
```

Is this likely to be due to libcore, ndarray, or something else?
